item.title: Customer Churn Analysis
item.description: Comprehensive analysis of customer churn in an Iranian Telecommunication company, using data preprocessing, model construction, and analysis to mitigate churn rate.

item.title: Webcam-Detection
item.description: Webcam detection system using computer vision technology to monitor and detect real-time object movements through webcam feed

item.title: Web Scraping Musical Event
item.description: An automated web scraping system to track and monitor musical tour updates from band websites in real-time.

item.title: Weather Forecast App
item.description: Dynamic weather forecast application featuring real-time data visualization for any global city's 5-day weather outlook.
